description: It’s our duty as pet owners to ensure that they are in good hands, says the writer. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Outsourcing the care of your pet is not simply a handover
title_page: Outsourcing the care of your pet is not simply a handover | The Straits Times
maintext:
Disturbing social media footage of a domestic helper beating a whimpering poodle left many netizens overwhelmed by shock and sadness.
A maid is now under investigation by the Animal and Veterinary Service (AVS) for allegedly beating her employer’s 13-year-old dog, Boyboy, to death in January, after the abuse was caught on closed-circuit television camera.
